#summary pluralize(word[returnCount,count])
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Returns the plural form of the passed in word.

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *returnCount* || boolean || false || true || Will return the count prepended to the pluralization when true and count is not -1. ||
|| *word* || string || true ||  || The word to pluralize. ||
|| *count* || numeric || false || -1 || Pluralization will occur when this value is not 1. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#pluralize("person")#
-> people
}}}

{{{
Your search returned #pluralize(word="person", count=users.recordCount)#.

}}}
